definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: One should bring a flashlight when walking in mountains at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜裏走山路，應該帶上電棒兒。

sentences.english: Police prodded her with electric shock clubs until she blistered on her chest, hands and feet.
sentences.chinese: 警察用電棒戳她，使她的胸口和手腳都起了泡。

sentences.english: This led to the invention of the electric rod and other electrical phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 於是引出了電棒和其它有關電現象的發明和發現。

definition: with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1

definition: alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
variant of 顯擺|显摆[xian3 bai5]
